'''2.2.1259''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.1260''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.1262''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on January 14, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Scaled Alex to be almost 3 blocks tall on the hero image

== Fixes ==
* Made changes to account initiation, as a attempt to fix grey-screen issue.
* Fixed spacing issue for key golem when using right-to-left languages
* Added external opening icon for patch notes links
* {{Bug|MCL-16374}} – Minecraft opens twice
* {{Bug|MCL-16349}} – Launcher temporarily is offline after logging in and out of a Mojang account while a Microsoft account is logged in
